text: kya ye kahate hain ki isane isako khud gadh liya hai to (ai rasool) tum kah do ki agar main isako (apane jee se) gadh leta to tum khuda ke saamane mere kuchh bhee kaam na aaoge jo jo baaten tum log usake baare mein karate rahate ho vah khoob jaanata hai mere aur tumhaare daramiyaan vahee gavaahee ko kaafee hai aur vahee bada bakhshane vaala hai meharabaan hai
